issue.title: [Java] Add maven-source-plugin to package source code
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17334](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17334). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
With maven-source-plugin plugin, we will get `arrow-vector-10.0.0-SNAPSHOT-sources.jar` in  ~/.m2/repository/org/apache/arrow/arrow-vector/10.0.0-SNAPSHOT/.

Then users can click Download Source to install it in Intellij, not current decompiled class, the line number and code will be reflected.
